title: Every update
body:
Every time an update is released my game seems to crash and corrupt the files making it unable to load the game up and unable to load the launcher. Do you know why this is? if so can you please help me out 

thanks

replies.body: There's a good chance that Cantarum was correct here! Sometimes firewalls will block certain files or accidentally corrupt them when you're patching. Next time try disabling those firewalls and making sure the client is running as admin during patches ^_^!

It maybe your firewall you have or protection system like "Norton" that is blocking needed files, causing your game to bug out man, I'm sorry to hear about that, but like I said maybe that, try turning it off next update.
Okay, thank you very much for your help will definitely do that for the next update.
